Pathway evidence

pathway.Rd

Pathway evidence

pathway(trait_name, pval_threshold = 1e-05, mode = c("table", "raw"))

Arguments

trait_name

A trait name
pval_threshold

P-value threshold
mode

If mode = "table", returns a data frame (a tibble as per tidyverse convention). If mode = "raw", returns a raw response from EpiGraphDB API with minimal parsing done by httr.

Value

Data from /pathway

Examples

pathway(trait_name = "Body mass index")
#> # A tibble: 79 x 12
#>    gwas.trait gwas.id mre_study_snp.se mre_study_snp.e… mre_study_snp.p…
#>    <chr>      <chr>              <dbl>            <dbl>            <dbl>
#>  1 Body mass… 2                 0.0037            0.2           6.66e-30
#>  2 Body mass… 835               0.0038            0.2           5.56e-28
#>  3 Body mass… 835               0.0031            0.649         2.66e-26
#>  4 Body mass… 2                 0.003             0.358         3.45e-25
#>  5 Body mass… 2                 0.003             0.358         3.45e-25
#>  6 Body mass… 2                 0.003             0.358         3.45e-25
#>  7 Body mass… 835               0.0031            0.358         3.14e-23
#>  8 Body mass… 835               0.0031            0.358         3.14e-23
#>  9 Body mass… 835               0.0031            0.358         3.14e-23
#> 10 Body mass… 785               0.0051            0.175         1.09e-19
#> # … with 69 more rows, and 7 more variables: mre_study_snp.samplesize <dbl>,
